about_the_game:
This is the lossless music of the 'Tower Hunter', wich contains nine music songs.
The town's music is gentle and soothig, accompanied by the moledy of the classic flute, which is just like being at home.
The music in the tower makes peopke feel full of mystery with a desire to explore visiting you.
Boss Battle music is fast and furious, making you full of morale.
Here's the track list:
1.Departure
2.Distant city
3.Dreamgirls
4.Eternal battle
5.River town
6.Shadowland
7.The cave
8.Tower hunter
9.Tower hunter2
10.Crazy burning
11.battlefield
12.Giant baby home
13.Final_battle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Win 7 64bit / Win 8 / Win 10
  • Processor: Intel(R)Core i3 2.7GHz
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460/Radeon HD 5800 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: at will
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Win 7 64bit / Win 8 / Win 10
  • Processor: Intel(R)Core i5 3.2GHz
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960/Radeon HD 7900 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: at will
